Name: Sally
Text: I can't believe the science region is so desolate.

Name: William
Text: They drastically changed their environment in the name of research.

Name: William
Text: The land might look differant, but I'm sure our advisor will remember the tactics they've learned.

Name: Sally
Text: The two of you make a really great team. Thanks for letting me join!

Name: Dr Deficit
Text: Da' hero of science 'as arrr-rrrived-a! Waaaah

Name: William
Text: It's good to see another friendly-

Name: Dr Deficit
Text: You prrresident lackeys won't beat me! You don't 'ave da' budget-a! I prrredicted it yearrrs ago!

Name: Sally
Text: Now wait- we're on the same team!

Name: Dr Deficit
Text: Waah, you fools-a! Science wil-l neva' bow down to de Univoisity Prrresident-a!
